name: Asterroid
description:
According to the game's lore, an asteroid falls to Earth, and almost all the animals and people hide in bunkers in the hope of escaping the explosion. You play as a ginger cat who is afraid to go outside, but still makes it to the surface in the hope of finding other survivors.

After the protagonist gets to the surface he sees the asteroid in the distance.  It turns out there was an alien slime inside it that captures planets for self-replication. The cat realizes that he urgently needs to find a survivor base before the aliens eat him.

Your task in the first game: to reach the survivor's base. A total of 27 levels are planned for the first game without checkpoints. 

The game is still in alpha testing

The actual version of game is 0.0.3 build 1

Release notes

0.0.3 build 1 - Added the sound of footsteps

0.0.3 - Added new sounds

0.0.2 build 2 - Added sound settings

0.0.2 build 1 - Added LDM settings

0.0.2 - Added fullscreen

0.0.1 - Game created
